DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_01: Tell me where Naars is, or I'll cut off your filthy hands.
DIA_Worker_QA306_Cutscene_03_02: What, did you lose your friend? Maybe look for him where Roel lies.
DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_03: Why would we kill Roel? You killed one of your own and now you're trying to frame us for it?
DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_04: I wanted us to have some kind of arrangement here where we could all earn a little money in a nice atmosphere, but as you can see, without a hard fist you can't do it.
DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_05: From now on, you will hand over all the gold you have mined, and if I see one of you being lazy, I will personally break his hands.
DIA_Worker_QA306_Cutscene_03_06: You have no right! We demand to see Igor!
DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_07: Forget Igor, I'm in charge now.
DIA_Bloodwyn_QA306_Cutscene_03_08: If I don't see Naars here all right by tomorrow, I'll come up with even more interesting punishments for you.
